name: examples-plugin-jsdoc
description: jsdoc plugin to add examples from external files

scripts.predocs: rm -rf ./docs && mkdir docs && npm run gitdown && npm run example-docs && mv ./example/docs ./docs/example-docs
scripts.xpredocs: rm -rf ./docs && mkdir docs && npm run example-docs && mv ./example/docs ./docs/example-docs
scripts.complexity: eslint index.js src/*.js test/*.js example/src/*.js example/test/*.js
scripts.style: standard index.js src/*.js test/*.js example/src/*.js example/test/*.js
scripts.pretest: npm run complexity && npm run style

author: Bill Moser
